I'm a Bioinformatics researcher specializing in bulk and single-cell RNA-seq, multi-omics integration, and machine learning applications in bioinformatics. My work spans development of scalable analysis pipelines, and mentoring of emerging computational biologists and bioinformaticians. I aim to advance computational methods that bridge biological discovery and clinical translation.
